params.text: UChaku wayethanda ukudlala nabangani bakhe.
Wayethanda ibhayisikili kaLila.
UChaku wanquma ukwenza ibhayisikili yakhe.
UChaku wayedinga izingodo.
UChaku wakhumbula ukuthi udinga njalo izipikili nesando.
UChaku waya kumalume wakhe eyocela usizo.
Umalume kaChaku wamnika amathuluzi. Umalume wacela uChaku ukuba aqaphele.
UChaku wacabanga ngendlela yokwakha ibhayisikili yakhe.
UChaku waqala ukwakha.
Yeka ibhayisikili ethandekayo! Kodwa yayingazinzile.
ULila wabona inkathazo kaChaku. Wanquma ukusiza.
Ngokubambisana, benza ibhayisikili eqinile.
UChaku wayegibela ibhayisikili lakhe, nomaphi lapho eya khona.
Kodwa isikhathi ayesithanda kakhulu, kwakungesikhathi yena noLila behamba ngamabhayisikili ndawonye.

“Umjikelezo wakaChaku” credits
This work, “Umjikelezo wakaChaku” is a derivative of Chaku's Cycleis translated byAlisha Berger. The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2016. Some rights reserved. Released under CC BY 4.0 license.Based on Original story:'Baiskeli ya Chaku', byUpendo Maria. © Room to Read , 2016. Some rights reserved.
